def_cn: （某人携带的或与特定活动有关的）大量物品，全套装备
def_en: You can refer to a large number of objects that someone has with them or that are connected with a particular activity as paraphernalia.
If you disapprove of the things and events that are involved in a particular system or activity, and you think they are unnecessary, you can refer to them as paraphernalia .
